subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The rebuilding of the Phoenix Coyotes was expected to take time. But Coach Wayne Gretzky’s Coyotes are now looking to make the playoffs for the first time since the 2001-2 season.
snippet: The rebuilding of the Phoenix Coyotes was expected to take time. But Coach Wayne Gretzky’s Coyotes are now looking to make the playoffs for the first time since the 2001-2 season.
